title: Reduced greenhouse gas emissions from particulate organic matter degradation in iron-enriched sediments
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00185K, Paper
Giulia Kommana, Michael Hupfer, Jason Woodhouse, Hans-Peter Grossart, Tobias Goldhammer
Iron (Fe) plays an important role in the biogeochemical cycling of carbon and nutrients in aquatic systems. Reactive Fe phases can interact with organic carbon and facilitate the removal of...
